thread.title: Nats ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during ALCS
thread.title_full: Nats ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during ALCS - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Nats ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during ALCS
text:
LOS ANGELES (AP) â€” Washington Nationals ace Max Scherzer will join Fox's studio show during the AL Championship Series .
Scherzer earlier this month became only the sixth major league pitcher to throw two no-hitters in the same season.
The network said Wednesday that he will join analysts Raul Ibanez , Pete Rose and Frank Thomas for pregame and postgame coverage starting with Friday's Game 1.
